needTips: 該如何開始需要一些提示？這裡簡單的指南！
webStep1Text: 少了真實世界的目標Habitica就什麼也不是，所以就讓我們來加入幾項任務吧！
step2: 步驟2：透過現實生活中的任務來贏得點數
webStep2Text: Now, start tackling your goals from the list! As you complete tasks and check them off in Habitica, you will gain [Experience](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Experience_Points), which helps you level up, and [Gold](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Gold_Points), which allows you to purchase Rewards. If you fall into bad habits or miss your Dailies, you will lose [Health](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Health_Points). In that way, the Habitica Experience and Health bars serve as a fun indicator of your progress toward your goals. You'll start seeing your real life improve as your character advances in the game.
webStep3Text:
Once you're familiar with the basics, you can get even more out of Habitica with these nifty features:
 * Organize your tasks with [tags](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Tags) (edit a task to add them).
 * Customize your [avatar](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Avatar) under [User > Avatar](/#/options/profile/avatar).
 * Buy your [equipment](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Equipment) under Rewards and change it under [Inventory > Equipment](/#/options/inventory/equipment).
 * Connect with other users via the [Tavern](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Tavern).
 * Starting at Level 3, hatch [pets](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Pets) by collecting [eggs](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Eggs) and [hatching potions](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Hatching_Potions). [Feed](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Food) them to create [mounts](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Mounts).
 * At level 10: Choose a particular [class](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Class_System) and then use class-specific [skills](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Skills) (levels 11 to 14).
 * Form a party with your friends under [Social > Party](/#/options/groups/party) to stay accountable and earn a Quest scroll.
 * Defeat monsters and collect objects on [quests](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Quests) (you will be given a quest at level 15).
